Significant changes may require reevaluation of the product. NOTE 2: Splicing of bars, except where shown on plans, will not be permitted without written approval from the engineer. A the present time, qualification for this list does not include an y fatigue test requirements. NOTE 3: All material, regardless of prior approval, shall be sampled in accordance with the Materials Sampling Manual and tested for conformance to the original specification. Any deviation in composition or performance from the original sample submitted may result in removal of the product from the qualified list. No information contained in this list is to be used for promotional purposes.
